synopsis.text: Grand Prix Final in Barcelona witnesses an extraordinary exhibition performance by the 15-year-old Yuri Plisetsky in "Yuri!!! on Ice: Welcome to The Madness OVA." As a bonus clip accompanying the sixth DVD/BD volume of the popular anime "Yuri!!! on Ice," this special showcases Yuri's bold attempt to shed his 'Russian Fairy' image. With never-before-seen choreography, Yuri unveils his short program "Welcome to The Madness," leaving the audience in awe and eager for more. Don't miss this electrifying performance that redefines Yuri's skating career!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
